completion: Main theek hoon, aap batao. Aaj main aapki kya help kar sakta hoon?

prompt:
User: Sunday ko kya plan hai?
Assistant:
completion: Sunday ke liye abhi koi pakka plan nahi hai. Shayad thoda rest karunga ya fir movie dekh sakta hoon. Aap ka kya plan hai?

prompt:
User: Mujhe ek website banana hai, kaise shuru karoon?
Assistant:
completion: Website banane ke liye aap HTML, CSS, aur JavaScript seekh sakte hain. Pehle basics samajhiye, phir kisi simple project se shuruwat kijiye. GitHub par code rakh sakte hain aur hosting ke liye Netlify ya Vercel use kar sakte hain.

prompt:
User: Bhai, ye Python code mein error aa raha hai, help kardo.
Assistant:
completion: Zaroor help karta hoon. Error message share kijiye aur code ka relevant section bhi dikhaiye. Main analyze karke bataunga ki problem kahan hai aur kaise fix kar sakte hain.

prompt:
User: Good morning! Aaj weather kaisa hai?
Assistant:
completion: Good morning! Main weather ki real-time information nahi de sakta, lekin aap apne phone ya computer par weather app check kar sakte hain. Kya aap kisi specific location ke bare mein puch rahe hain?

prompt:
User: Yaar, mujhe job interview ke liye tips chahiye
Assistant:
completion: Interview ke liye kuch important tips: Company ke bare mein research karein, apne resume ko acche se jaaniye, common questions ke answers prepare karein, professional dress pehne, aur time se pahunch jaayein. Also, apne strengths aur experiences ke examples ready rakhein.

prompt:
User: Kya tum mujhe ek simple algorithm explain kar sakte ho?
Assistant:
completion: Bilkul! Binary search algorithm samjhata hoon. Ye sorted array mein element dhoondhne ka fast tarika hai. Algorithm array ko half-half karke target element ko compare karta hai, phir sirf relevant half mein search continue karta hai. Isse time complexity O(log n) ho jati hai, jo linear search se bahut faster hai.

prompt:
User: Pizza order karna hai, suggestions do na
Assistant:
completion: Pizza order karne ke liye kuch suggestions: Margherita classic choice hai, veggie lovers ke liye garden fresh accha option hai. Non-veg me pepperoni popular hai. Size family ke hisab se choose karein. Extra cheese, stuffed crust, ya special toppings add kar sakte hain. Koi particular flavor preference hai aapka?

prompt:
User: How to improve my English speaking skills?
Assistant:
completion: English improve karne ke liye daily practice zaroori hai. English movies and shows dekhiye, English news suniye, aur roz kuch minutes English mein baat karne ki koshish karein. Language learning apps like Duolingo bhi helpful hain. Most important - mistakes se darna mat, confidence ke saath bolna seekhiye.

prompt:
User: Mera phone hang ho raha hai, kya karoon?
Assistant:
completion: Phone hang hone par try kijiye: Pehle phone restart karein. Agar problem persist kare, to unnecessary apps close karein ya uninstall karein. Storage check karein, cache clear karein. Background processes ko limit karein. Agar ye solutions kaam na karein, to factory reset last option hai, lekin pehle data backup zaroor kar lein.

prompt:
User: Tomorrow mere exams hain, I'm feeling nervous
Assistant:
completion: Exam stress feel karna normal hai. Last minute mein important topics review karein, proper rest lein, aur healthy khana khayein. Deep breathing exercises try karein tension kam karne ke liye. Yaad rakhein - aap ne preparation ki hai, confidence rakhiye. All the best for your exams!

prompt:
User: Can you recommend some books to read?
Assistant:
completion: Zaroor! Kuch popular books jo recommend kar sakta hoon: 'The Alchemist' by Paulo Coelho, 'Sapiens' by Yuval Noah Harari, 'Ikigai' jo life balance ke baare mein hai. Hindi mein, Premchand ki 'Godaan' ya Amrita Pritam ki books acchi hain. Kisi specific genre mein interested hain aap?

prompt:
User: Mujhe coding sikhni hai, lekin konsi language?
Assistant:
completion: Coding start karne ke liye, Python ek beginner-friendly language hai - simple syntax aur versatile applications. Web development mein interest hai to HTML/CSS/JavaScript try karein. Mobile apps ke liye Kotlin (Android) ya Swift (iOS). Aapke goal pe depend karta hai - job ke liye, projects ke liye, ya just learning ke liye?

prompt:
User: Bhai, best smartphone under 20k batao
Assistant:
completion: 20k budget mein kuch acche options hain: Redmi Note series, Realme number series, ya Samsung M series. In phones mein accha camera, battery life, aur performance milta hai. Aapki priority kya hai - camera, gaming, battery life ya overall performance? Uske hisab se exact model suggest kar sakta hoon.

prompt:
User: I'm planning a trip to Goa next month
Assistant:
completion: Goa trip ke liye great choice! October-March best time hota hai visit karne ka. North Goa mein Baga, Calangute beaches popular hain, South Goa more peaceful hai. Local Goan cuisine zaroor try karein. Water sports, beach hopping, aur Old Goa ke churches visit kar sakte hain. Budget hotels se lekar luxury resorts tak options available hain.
